00030 #define ASCII_PERCENT_CHAR 37
00031 #define MAX_ENTRY_ARRAY 1024
00032 
00033 struct Entry *p_entry = &entry;
00034 struct Entry entry_array[MAX_ENTRY_ARRAY];
00035 
00036 struct Entry *find_entry_by_name(sqlite3_stmt *pp_stmt,
00037                                  char *name)
00038 {
00039         int num_column;
00040         int count;
00041         char *col_name;
00042         char *col_value;
00043 
00044         num_column = sqlite3_column_count(pp_stmt);
00045         col_name = sqlite3_malloc(2 * num_column * sizeof(const char *) + 1);
00046 
00047         for ( count = 0; count < num_column; count++ ) {
00048                 col_name = (char *)sqlite3_column_name(pp_stmt, count);
00049                 col_value = (char *)sqlite3_column_text(pp_stmt, count);
00050                 if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_PRIORITY) ) {
00051                         p_entry->priority = atoi(col_value);
00052                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_COUNTRYCODE) ) {
00053                         p_entry->country_code = atoi(col_value);
00054                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_AREACODE) ) {
00055                         p_entry->area_code = atoi(col_value);
00056                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_NUMBER) ) {
00057                         p_entry->number = atoll(col_value);
00058                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_NAME) ) {
00059                         p_entry->name = col_value;
00060                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_REASON) ) {
00061                         p_entry->reason = col_value;
00062                 }
00063         }
00064         return p_entry;
00065 }
00066 
00067 struct Entry *get_entry_by_name(char *name,
00068                                 int listflag)
00069 {
00070         char *listname;
00071         switch (listflag) {
00072                 case WHITELIST_FLAG:
00073                         listname = "whitelist";
00074                         break;
00075                 case BLACKLIST_FLAG:
00076                         listname = "blacklist";
00077                         break;
00078                 default: return NULL;
00079         }
00080 
00081         sqlite3 *db;
00082         char stmt[STMT_SIZE];
00083         sqlite3_stmt *pp_stmt = 0;
00084         const char **p_tail = 0;
00085         int rc;
00086         char logmsg[MAX_LINE_LENGTH];
00087 
00088         rc = sqlite3_open(DB_FILE, &db);
00089 
00090         if ( rc ) {
00091                 sprintf(logmsg, "Can't open database: %s", sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00092                 write_logentry(logmsg, "phonefirewall", ERR_FLAG);
00093                 sqlite3_close(db);
00094                 return NULL;
00095         }
00096 
00097         sprintf(stmt, "SELECT %1$s, %2$s, %3$s, %4$s, %5$s, %6$s FROM %9$s WHERE %5$s like \'%8$c%7$s%8$c\'", TB_PRIORITY, TB_COUNTRYCODE, TB_AREACODE, TB_NUMBER, TB_NAME, TB_REASON, name, ASCII_PERCENT_CHAR, listname);
00098 
00099         rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, stmt, sizeof(stmt), &pp_stmt, p_tail);
00100 
00101         if ( rc != SQLITE_OK ) {
00102                 sprintf(logmsg, "SQL error: %s", sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00103                 write_logentry(logmsg, "phonefirewall", ERR_FLAG);
00104                 sqlite3_close(db);
00105                 return NULL;
00106         }
00107 
00108         int count = 0;
00109         printf("\nafter the find_entry_by_name(...) in get_entry_by_name(char *name):\n");
00110         while ( rc != SQLITE_DONE ) {
00111                 rc = sqlite3_step(pp_stmt);
00112                 if ( SQLITE_ROW == rc ) {
00113                         p_entry = find_entry_by_name(pp_stmt, name);
00114                         entry_array[count] = *p_entry;
00115                         printf("+%d %d %llu -> %s :: %s\n", entry_array[count].country_code, entry_array[count].area_code, entry_array[count].number, entry_array[count].name, entry_array[count].reason);
00116                         count++;
00117                 }
00118         }
00119 
00120         printf("\nbefore the return statement in get_entry_by_name(char *name):\n");
00121         count = 0;
00122         for ( count = 0; count < 4; count++ )
00123                 printf("+%d %d %llu -> %s :: %s\n", entry_array[count].country_code, entry_array[count].area_code, entry_array[count].number, entry_array[count].name, entry_array[count].reason);
00124 
00125         return entry_array;
00126 }
